text: Gif ðu wille for þinra synna bereowsunge gedon & andetnesse þinra scylda þonne scealt þu swa mycel swa ðu meaht mid inreweardan heortan na mid efestlican wordan ac mid geþencendan mode þas vii Daviðes <psalms> to dædbote gelomlice singan.
& þu findæst swiðe hrædlice godes mildheortnesse ymban ðe & þin mod bið mid gastlicere blisse onlihted.
